description: Lists the exports for a bot, bot locale, or custom vocabulary. Exports are kept in the list for 7 days.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Determines the field that the list of exports is sorted by. You can sort by the LastUpdatedDateTime field in ascending or descending order. The export field to use for sorting. The order to sort the list.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: The export field to use for sorting.

nested_params.name: order
nested_params.description: The order to sort the list.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Provides the specification of a filter used to limit the exports in the response to only those that match the filter specification. You can only specify one filter and one string to filter on. (dict) --- Filters the response form the ListExports operation The name of the field to use for filtering. The values to use to filter the response. The values must be Bot, BotLocale, or CustomVocabulary. (string) --- The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListExports operation should return only resource types that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListExports operation should return resource types that contain the specified value.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the field to use for filtering.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The values to use to filter the response. The values must be Bot, BotLocale, or CustomVocabulary.

nested_params.name: operator
nested_params.description: The operator to use for the filter. Specify EQ when the ListExports operation should return only resource types that equal the specified value. Specify CO when the ListExports operation should return resource types that contain the specified value.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: If the response from the ListExports operation contains more results that specified in the maxResults parameter, a token is returned in the response. Use the returned token in the nextToken parameter of a ListExports request to return the next page of results. For a complete set of results, call the ListExports operation until the nextToken returned in the response is null.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier assigned to the bot by Amazon Lex.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that was exported.

nested_items.name: exportSummaries
nested_items.description: Summary information for the exports that meet the filter criteria specified in the request. The length of the list is specified in the maxResults parameter. If there are more exports available, the nextToken field contains a token to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: exportId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier that Amazon Lex assigned to the export.

nested_items.name: resourceSpecification
nested_items.description: Information about the bot or bot locale that was exported.

nested_items.name: botExportSpecification
nested_items.description: Parameters for exporting a bot.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot assigned by Amazon Lex.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that was exported. This will be either DRAFT or the version number.

nested_items.name: botLocaleExportSpecification
nested_items.description: Parameters for exporting a bot locale.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot to create the locale for.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot to export.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the language and locale to export. The string must match one of the locales in the bot.

nested_items.name: customVocabularyExportSpecification
nested_items.description: The parameters required to export a custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot that contains the custom vocabulary to export.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that contains the custom vocabulary to export.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The locale of the bot that contains the custom vocabulary to export.

nested_items.name: testSetExportSpecification
nested_items.description: Specifications for the test set that is exported as a resource.

nested_items.name: testSetId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the test set.

nested_items.name: fileFormat
nested_items.description: The file format used in the export files.

nested_items.name: exportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the export. When the status is Completed the export is ready to download.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the export was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the export was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates whether there are more results to return in a response to the ListExports operation. If the nextToken field is present, you send the contents as the nextToken parameter of a ListExports operation request to get the next page of results.

nested_items.name: localeId
nested_items.description: The locale specified in the request.
